applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DELEGATING MANAGEMENT OF A FINANCIAL TRANSACTION ACCOUNT TO A DESIGNATED ASSISTANT

abstract.p: Systems, methods and computer program products for enabling a holder of a transaction account linked to a financial transaction instrument to delegate management of the transaction account to an assistant. Information relating to the transaction account, including at least identification information relating to the holder of the transaction account, is stored in a database. The database stores financial transaction data relating to financial transactions performed using the financial transaction instrument. A designation of at least one assistant to manage the transaction account on behalf of the holder is accepted and stored. Assistant management authentication data associated with the transaction account is established, to be used by the assistant to execute management instructions at a designated level of management access. An instruction from the assistant is accepted to access transaction data associated with the transaction account.

applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC

abstract.p: Systems, methods and computer program products for enabling a holder of a transaction account linked to a financial transaction instrument to delegate management of the transaction account to an assistant. Information relating to the transaction account, including at least identification information relating to the holder of the transaction account, is stored in a database. The database stores financial transaction data relating to financial transactions performed using the financial transaction instrument. A designation of at least one assistant to manage the transaction account on behalf of the holder is accepted and stored. Assistant management authentication data associated with the transaction account is established, to be used by the assistant to execute management instructions at a designated level of management access.
An instruction from the assistant is accepted to access transaction data associated with the transaction account.

applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC,

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR DELEGATING MANAGEMENT OF A FINANCIAL TRANSACTION ACCOUNT TO A DESIGNATED ASSISTANT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE DELEGATION DE LA GESTION D'UN COMPTE DE TRANSACTIONS FINANCIERES A UN ASSISTANT DESIGNE

abstract.p: Systems, methods and computer program products for enabling a holder of a transaction account linked to a financial transaction instrument to delegate management of the transaction account to an assistant. Information relating to the transaction account, including at least identification information relating to the holder of the transaction account, is stored in a database. The database stores financial transaction data relating to financial transactions performed using the financial transaction instrument. A designation of at least one assistant to manage the transaction account on behalf of the holder is accepted and stored. Assistant management authentication data associated with the transaction account is established, to be used by the assistant to execute management instructions at a designated level of management access.
An instruction from the assistant is accepted to access transaction data associated with the transaction account.

L'invention concerne des systèmes, des procédés et des produits de programme informatique destinés à permettre au titulaire d'un compte de transactions associé à un instrument de transactions financières, de déléguer la gestion du compte de transactions à un assistant. Des informations concernant le compte de transactions, contenant au moins une information d'identification concernant le titulaire du compte de transactions, sont stockées dans une base de données. La base de données stocke des données de transactions financières concernant les transactions financières réalisées au moyen de l'instrument de transactions financières. Une désignation d'au moins un assistant destiné à gérer le compte de transactions pour le compte du titulaire est acceptée et enregistrée.

Des données d'authentification de gestion d'assistant associées au compte de transactions sont établies afin d'être employées par l'assistant pour l'exécution d'instructions de gestion à un niveau désigné d'accès de gestion. Une instruction émanant de l'assistant est acceptée pour l'accès aux données de transactions associées au compte de transactions.

applicant-name.name: AMERICAN EXPRESS TRAVEL RELATED SERVICES COMPANY,INC,
